item.title: Text Summarization with Deep Learning
item.description:
Speaker(s): Yashmeet Gambhir
Topic: Text Summarization with Deep Learning

Yash discussed text summarization, where the goal is to… summarize text. More specifically, he discussed abstractive summarization, of which the goal is to generate novel sentences using natural language generation techniques. One such method for doing this is using pointer-generator networks. After discussing PGNs, he went on to discuss a paper describing extreme summarization to combat model hallucination for this task. The papers discussed are linked below.

You can find a recording of his talk here. Unfortunately this only includes the second half of the talk about abstractive summarization, because we forgot to record starting at the beginning.
